data.title: Regional Championships :: USHJA
data.text:
Platinum Performance/USHJA International Hunter Derby Regional Championships

USHJA International Hunter Derby Program offers six regional championships held across the country as an added benefit to participants. Exhibitors may choose whichever regional championship they want, and horses may compete in multiple regional championships.

Horses must be enrolled in the program to be eligible to participate.

North Championship

Saratoga Classic II

June 19-23, 2024

Stillwater, NY North Central Championship

Traverse City Spring Horse Show II

June 12-16, 2024

Traverse City, MI South Championship

Holiday & Horses

November 27-30, 2024

Wellington, FL

South Central Championship

Southwest Showdown

September 18-22, 2024

Katy, TX

Northwest Championship

Northwest Spectacular

August 28-September 1, 2024

Wilsonville, OR

Southwest Championship

National Sunshine Series II

November 6-10, 2024

Thermal, CA

Specifications for International Hunter Derby Regional Championships
